enDesc: Daat Zekenim is a Torah commentary compiled by later generations of scholars from the writings of the Franco-German school in the 12th-13th century (Ba’alei Tosafot).
heDesc: פירוש לתורה שנלקט מכתבי בעלי התוספות.
